summary: Comprehensive pytest suite for the Annif automatic subject indexing library, covering analyzers, various backends (fasttext, HTTP, MLLM, neural ensembles, Omikuji, PAV, STWFSA, SVC, TF‑IDF, Yake), command‑line interface, configuration parsing, corpus handling, evaluation metrics, custom exceptions, lexical models, parallel utilities, project management, REST API endpoints, suggestion result handling, Swagger documentation, input transformations, utility functions, and vocabulary loading in multiple formats.
business_intent: Provide thorough automated verification of Annif's functionality to ensure reliable subject indexing, correct model behavior, proper configuration handling, and stable API responses across all components.
